DOC.brief_title: Manual Therapy Versus Manual Therapy Exercise Education Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Nonspecific chronic neck pain high prevalence common clinical practice . Manual therapy ( MT ) study techniques like mobilization , manipulation , therapeutic exercise , demonstrate effectiveness treatment pain disability neck . These investigation think treatment individual intervention . Thus , multimodal way treatment improve patient nonspecific chronic neck pain necessary . The aim study evaluate effectiveness multimodal treatment protocol compare unimodal treatment protocol medium-term , patient chronic non-specific neck pain . Subjects randomly allocate three group : MT group ; MT+Educational therapy ( ET ) group ; MT+ET+Exercise group . Each subject receive 4 week period treatment ( 8 session ) . Outcome measure include physical , somatosensory , psychosocial characteristic ; measure 0 , 4 , 8 , 16 week blind assessor .
